verses.name: Ecclesiastes 3:20
verses.text: All go unto one place; all are of the dust, and all turn to dust again.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 3:21
verses.text: Who knoweth the spirit of man that goeth upward, and the spirit of the beast that goeth downward to the earth?

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 3:22
verses.text: Wherefore I perceive that there is nothing better, than that a man should rejoice in his own works; for that is his portion: for who shall bring him to see what shall be after him?
